flametree 0.0.1
  • Reference

flametree

The goal of flametree is to make pretty pictures.

Installation

You can install the development version of flametree from GitHub with:

# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("djnavarro/flametree")

Example

library(flametree)

flametree_grow(time = 12) %>% 
  flametree_plot()         

flametree_grow(seed = 1, trees = 5)  %>% 
  flametree_plot(style = "voronoi")

flametree_grow(trees = 16, shift_x = spark_nothing())  %>% 
  flametree_plot(style = "nativeflora")
